author: VCUBNFO
body:
My biggest concern about Germany is whether they will be able to pivot to electric cars.

Or more accurately, I know they will eventually pivot to electric cars, but will they be as dominant in that as they are with fossil fuel vehicles?

Tesla is already giving them a run for their money.

People seem to think that giant companies like VW and Mercedes can just pivot to new fields like this, but look at how Google did with Google+ or Microsoft did with mobile.
